{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>Die <BIBL><TITLE>Mangoldische Bibel</TITLE> <YEAR>1729</YEAR></BIBL>. Die <BIBL><TITLE>Jelische Lexicon</TITLE> <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Stettlers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Schweitzer-Chronick</TITLE></BIBL>, das <TITLE>Reich der Todten</TITLE>, samt noch einigen anderen neuen frantzösisch historischen Büchern, davon der Catalogus bey Herrn M. Daniel Meyer im Collegio zu sehen ist, als welcher diese Bücher zu verkauffen in Commi-ßion hat.</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":6,"explanation":"1. Added closing </BIBL> tag for the third book entry to maintain consistent structure.
2. Corrected special character encoding issues for 'frantzösisch' and 'Büchern'.
3. Ensured spacing and punctuation were consistent, particularly around the commas and periods.
4. Used a hyphen in 'Schweitzer-Chronick' for consistency with other titles.
5. Corrected the word 'Commi-ßion' to ensure proper spelling.
6. Adjusted the text to ensure all XML tags properly encapsulate their respective contents."}

2. Corrected special character encoding issues for 'frantzösisch' and 'Büchern'.
3. Ensured spacing and punctuation were consistent, particularly around the commas and periods.
4. Used a hyphen in 'Schweitzer-Chronick' for consistency with other titles.
5. Corrected the word 'Commi-ßion' to ensure proper spelling.
6. Adjusted the text to ensure all XML tags properly encapsulate their respective contents.
